title: Watched haram on YouTube, Will I be sinful 4 giving them more views, delete account? Assim al hakeem
transcript: fidan says that she wanted to remove her youtube account due to the fact that she saw something wrong or sinful and she was afraid that by adding the viewership so instead of having a million viewers having a million and one because of her that would endorse this sinful act so she wants to delete her youtube uh uh channel account this is too extreme there's nothing as such you didn't intend it you did not endorse it and you do not go around tell people to come and watch watching it or adding a number to it does not count as a sin the sin isn't watching it intentionally adding a number would not contribute to that
